game.shortDescription: 사상 최대의 야심작으로 돌아온 Company of Heroes 3에서는 눈부신 지중해 전구를 배경으로 한 가슴 뛰는 전투와 심도 있는 전략적 선택이 갖춰져 있습니다. Company of Heroes 3의 전투에는 모두 이야기가 깃들어 있습니다... 여러분의 이야기는 무엇입니까?"
game.shortDescriptionEn: Company of Heroes 3 combines heart-pounding combat with deeper strategic choices in a stunning Mediterranean theatre of war. In Company of Heroes 3, every battle tells a story...what's yours?

reviewHighlights.text: I will start off by saying that I don't care about multiplayer meta, I'm only going to talk about what the game offers to a singleplayer-only player....
If you're new to PvP RTS games like I am—come prepared. This insight is for you. After the disastrous launch, it's a proper game now, and goes on sale...
